pageContext.claim: “They [House Democrats] could have been looking into China [instead of impeachment]. They should have been looking into China, as an example. A lot of people are blaming the Democrats for wasting all that time, because it was during that period of time, as you know, that it was fomenting.”
pageContext.analysis: This is mostly false. The House approved two articles of impeachment against Trump on Dec. 18, before the first reports of covid-19. The Senate trial lasted until Feb. 5 and overlapped with the first coronavirus reports, but that chamber is controlled by Republicans. Trump's comments were aimed at House Democrats, only seven of whom participated in the Senate trial.
